lore: A powerful tribe of Revenants once tried to invade the kingdom of Ahruna. The Desert Priest quickly mobilized its army, and in a matter of hours the Revenants were divided between those who wanted to continue with the invasion and those who did not.\n\nRevenant Soldiers form the bulk of the deep-sea armies. They are reckless warriors with great physical strength who attack their enemies without worrying about their own safety.
menagerieDialog: It's a common misconception that all Revenants like to fight. I, for one, would prefer to lead a quiet life and dedicate myself to collecting minerals.
What's wrong? You look like a fish out of water.\n\nHA!
(Revenants hate when you call them "fish people". Never make that mistake.)
I am not a fish. I am NOT. A FISH.\n\n(This is the most sensitive fish you've ever met.)
(It smells like dead fish. Probably because that's exactly what it is.)
name: Revenant Soldier
